thread.title: North Korea's Kim Jong Un visits China, meets President Xi

title: North Korea's Kim Jong Un visits China, meets President Xi
text:
North Korea's Kim Jong Un visits China, meets President Xi 9:23pm IST - 00:48
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has been on a two-day visit to China to meet with President Xi Jinping, their second encounter in two months. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has been on a two-day visit to China to meet with President Xi Jinping, their second encounter in two months. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
